Welcome

Mecheye Fusion is a Python library to create and parse valid SWF and ABC files. It was created by Jasper St. Pierre to try and understand the SWF format.

How To Get It

Fusion is available as an easy-installable package on the Python Package Index.

The stable repo can be found on GitHub, at http://github.com/mecheye/mecheye-fusion.

Development repo can be found on GitHub, at http://github.com/magcius/mecheye-fusion.
